waddington.kai.main.knnf.layers

Class LayerFlatten

  • java.lang.Object
    • waddington.kai.main.knnf.layers.Layer
      • waddington.kai.main.knnf.layers.LayerFlatten

  • public class LayerFlatten
extends Layer
    This is the class for the flattening layer. It extends the Layer class, and is a required layer between 2D layers and 1D layers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LayerFlatten(int id)
      See Layer.Layer(int, LayerType, LayerActivation).

      • createNeurons

        public void createNeurons(int number)
        Creates the neurons for this layer. 1 neuron per value/cell.
        Specified by:
        createNeurons in class Layer
        Parameters:
        number - The number of neurons to create.

      • setInputData

        public void setInputData(java.util.List<Neuron> inputNeurons)
        Sets the input data to each neuron in this layer. Has to calculate the ID of the neuron in this layer as it transforms a list of 2D matrices to a 1xN matrix.
        Specified by:
        setInputData in class Layer
        Parameters:
        inputNeurons - The list of neurons to get the data from.
